entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:52 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 12:00 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Overcast. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
